bug.author: Danmou
bug.summary: GIFs are tiny and don't react to zoom
bug.description:
My model saves gif summaries of size 640x128. In the web interface they look like this: <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/7031745/66306082-16e73100-e901-11e9-8feb-9acb4be421bf.png></denchmark-link>
and changing the zoom setting has no effect. Images of the same size work fine.

comments.comment: Issue-Label Bot is automatically applying the label bug to this issue, with a confidence of 0.88. Please mark this comment with 👍 or 👎 to give our bot feedback! Links: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/marketplace/issue-label-bot>app homepage</denchmark-link> , <denchmark-link:https://mlbot.net/data/wandb/client>dashboard</denchmark-link> and <denchmark-link:https://github.com/hamelsmu/MLapp>code</denchmark-link> for this bot.
Hi! Thanks for reporting this issue. We'll take a look.
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/Danmou>@Danmou</denchmark-link> This has been fixed and deployed.
